title: Calculating Grades Using Functions
description: Create a program that calculates the grade of a student based on their score. The program should have two functions: one to calculate the grade and another to display the result. The grade calculation is as follows: scores 90 and above are Grade A, scores between 80 and 89 are Grade B, scores between 70 and 79 are Grade C, scores between 60 and 69 are Grade D, and scores below 60 are Grade F.
